room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: Had a blast. If you're on the fence, do it! Great for groups. Javar was fantastic! This would be a perfect place to have a birthday party or just some get together. The puzzles get somewhat challenging so bring your smart friends to help

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: I definitely recommend coming here for an escape adventure. This place has not only a variety of puzzles in each room, it also has different themes that are sure to get everyone excited. The staff are friendly and very accommodating for you.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: That was amazing!!!!! We've been to escape rooms all over the country and this is by far one of the best. Super detailed rooms with tons of fun puzzles, unexpected surprises and openings. Plus a great staff! We were celebrating a birthday and they gave us a card that everyone signed with sweet little noted and gave to us with a free escape room birthday shirt. Will be coming back for sure.

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: This was my first escape room and I truly enjoyed it.  It's not easy but a great challenge.  My family and I managed to escape.  Don't miss out on this it's so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "Special Ops: Mysterious Market" by The Escape Game Houston in Houston
review: My 3rd times/3 different rooms with Escape Game Houston. We did the new game Special Ops and escaped with 3 mins left!!! this is the best escape room place in Houston i've done so far.
